chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 is experiencing the following issue:

Visible scratches on the lower edge despite a command for an iPhone in 'very good condition'.

Thank you for your help.

Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer meets all the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product has not been repaired by a third party and has not suffered any damage due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been deleted.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands they must include accessories as well as a proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 business days (5 if it's a laptop or home appliance) to replace or repair your product. Or, 2 business days to process a refund (if you're eligible).

Dear Backcare,

We have refunded the customer. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
